title: Emerald Dragon - FM Towns
description:
Emerald Dragon - FM Towns      
 
This is an RPG for the Fujitsu FM Towns Japan market computer. 

Here is a good site explaining it: http://emedra.lakuuna.org/ 

Posting this as a response to a request 

Requires a system disk floppy, included in the zip archive. I have had some difficultly getting this to boot with Unz, but the ISO seems fine, since I can see it and the CDDA tracks. May just be a settings issue, and I\&#039;m not using default Unz settings.
